title: EVERYONE IN MY TEAM LEAVES
body: I was playing a normal, blind pick game we were doing phenomenal (me and my vayne as morgana) and like 10 minutes in, EVERY ONE DC AT THE SAME TIME. I WAS LEFT ATTEMPTIN A 1V5 AND WE(I) LOST HORRIBLY. I noticed there names were similar so they were obviously premade. I asked the enemy team to report them and they did and I just hope that you guys will report them or ban them as well.

replies.body:
Sometimes people play pre made and play off the same internet source (I live in a house with 6 other league players) and sometimes weird things happen to the internet, just like when s single player disconnects and reconnects a short time after. the problem being that either everyone, or the majority of everyone (like in your case) disconnect. Usually, it isn't their fault and I doubt that they would intentionally AFK in the situation you are describing, I also doubt that they would have foreseen such a tragic event as an internet cutout. 

TL:DR Probably not intentional on their behalf.

Well that sucks. But have you ever thought that they lived in Sydney? We did hav a huge thunder storm and probs their internet modems blew up (over surged)

Just a thought
